release.name: v2.5.0-alpha.3
release.body:
Release v2.5.0-alpha.3

## What's Changed

* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.0 by @jimmidyson in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/71

release.name: v2.5.0-alpha.2
release.body:
Release v2.5.0-alpha.2

## What's Changed
* docs: Add note about installation by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/19
* test: setup pre-commit + initial unit test suite by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/20
* ci: Add CI configs by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/24
* chore(deps): bump k8s.io/api from 0.23.0 to 0.23.1 in /tests by @dependabot in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/29
* fix: Add namespace in helmreleases by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/31
* test: Add tests to validate HelmReleases reference existing repos by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/30
* test: generate test files during tests by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/36
* chore: bump deps by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/35
* chore(deps): bump github.com/onsi/gomega from 1.17.0 to 1.18.1 in /tests by @dependabot in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/38
* chore: add koperator 0.20.2 by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/44
* feat: wire up kustomization for helm repo by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/46
* feat: add bloodhound validation to dkp-catalog-applications by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/51
* feat: spark-operator 1.1.17 by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/52
* feat: Add image bundle release targets by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/56
* ci: Pass through AWS env vars by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/57
* feat: add certification labels by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/53
* chore: add label to allow dynamic secret injection by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/55
* build: Add missing zk image by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/58
* build:  Use /dkp/<version> as s3 path for release by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/59
* build: Make image bundle release name consistent by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/60
* build: add repo archive target by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/61
* build: remove prefix on the git archive by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/62
* build: Add chart bundle release targets by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/63
* chore: logs published urls for the release by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/64
* feat: disable deploying multiple operators instances per workspace by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/65
* feat: notify in slack about release by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/66
* chore: skip slack notification in case of dev release by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/67
* build: add validation against multiple Kubernetes versions by @floridoo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/69
* chore: bump bloodhound by @floridoo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/70
* chore: add Kubernetes version support metadata by @floridoo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/71
* chore: bump bloodhound, important fix for Helm chart validation by @floridoo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/73
* feat: update image bundle extension by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/74
* build: add attribution file in release targets by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/75
* build: add missing space by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/76
* fix release s3 target by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/77
* ci: Use go1.19 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/79

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/29
* @farhan5900 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/64
* @floridoo made their first contribution in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/69

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/compare/v2.1.4...v2.5.0-alpha.2

release.name: v2.4.0
release.body:
Release v2.4.0

## What's Changed
* feat: align configmap-reload image tag with other containers by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/64
* feat: use TFA 3.0.3 by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/65
* chore: Add mergebot config by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/67
* chore: bump metallb app by @vespian in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/66
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.0 by @jimmidyson in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/71
* feat: add an audit dashboard to grafana-logging by @asekretenko in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/72
* chore: Bump logging-operator to 3.15.0 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/76
* chore: Update Charts of KPS to 18.1.1 & Grafana to 6.16.14 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/70
* chore: update docker image tag for dex by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/74
* feat: Provide release target by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/77
* fix: updating docs link to kubecost by @msdolbey in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/81
* Add NFS Server Provisioner service by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/78
* chore: Use workspaceNamespace instead of traefikNamespace by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/80
* chore: Add kubecost 0.20.2 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/84
* chore: update docker image tag for dex-k8s-auth by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/85
* fix: Restore all pod labels to metrics emitted by kube-state-metrics by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/83
* fix: Deploy fluent-bit for pod logs to control plane by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/86
* feat: add knative serving as kommander application by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/89

* fix: Remove kube-prometheus-stack dep from knative by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/103

* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.1 by @d2iq-dispatch in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/91
* fix: Remove newlines in knative icon by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/109

## What's Changed
* feat: align configmap-reload image tag with other containers by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/64

* chore: bump metallb app by @vespian in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/66
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.0 by @jimmidyson in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/71
* feat: add an audit dashboard to grafana-logging by @asekretenko in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/72
* chore: Bump logging-operator to 3.15.0 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/76
* chore: Update Charts of KPS to 18.1.1 & Grafana to 6.16.14 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/70
* chore: update docker image tag for dex by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/74
* feat: Provide release target by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/77
* fix: updating docs link to kubecost by @msdolbey in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/81
* Add NFS Server Provisioner service by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/78
* chore: Use workspaceNamespace instead of traefikNamespace by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/80

* chore: update docker image tag for dex-k8s-auth by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/85
* fix: Restore all pod labels to metrics emitted by kube-state-metrics by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/83
* fix: Deploy fluent-bit for pod logs to control plane by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/86
* feat: add knative serving as kommander application by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/89

* fix: Remove kube-prometheus-stack dep from knative by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/103

release.body:
Release v2.4.0-rc.3

## What's Changed
* docs: Add note about installation by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/19
* test: setup pre-commit + initial unit test suite by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/20
* ci: Add CI configs by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/24
* chore(deps): bump k8s.io/api from 0.23.0 to 0.23.1 in /tests by @dependabot in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/29
* fix: Add namespace in helmreleases by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/31
* test: Add tests to validate HelmReleases reference existing repos by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/30
* test: generate test files during tests by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/36
* chore: bump deps by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/35
* chore(deps): bump github.com/onsi/gomega from 1.17.0 to 1.18.1 in /tests by @dependabot in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/38
* chore: add koperator 0.20.2 by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/44
* feat: wire up kustomization for helm repo by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/46
* feat: add bloodhound validation to dkp-catalog-applications by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/51
* feat: spark-operator 1.1.17 by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/52
* feat: Add image bundle release targets by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/56
* ci: Pass through AWS env vars by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/57
* feat: add certification labels by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/53
* chore: add label to allow dynamic secret injection by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/55
* build: Add missing zk image by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/58
* build:  Use /dkp/<version> as s3 path for release by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/59
* build: Make image bundle release name consistent by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/60
* build: add repo archive target by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/61
* build: remove prefix on the git archive by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/62
* build: Add chart bundle release targets by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/63
* chore: logs published urls for the release by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/64
* feat: disable deploying multiple operators instances per workspace by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/65
* feat: notify in slack about release by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/66
* chore: skip slack notification in case of dev release by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/67
* build: add validation against multiple Kubernetes versions by @floridoo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/69
* chore: bump bloodhound by @floridoo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/70
* chore: add Kubernetes version support metadata by @floridoo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/71
* chore: bump bloodhound, important fix for Helm chart validation by @floridoo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/73
* feat: update image bundle extension by @cbuto in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/74
* build: add attribution file in release targets by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/75
* build: add missing space by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/76
* fix release s3 target by @cwyl02 in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/77
* ci: Use go1.19 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/79

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/29
* @farhan5900 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/64
* @floridoo made their first contribution in https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/pull/69

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/mesosphere/dkp-catalog-applications/compare/v2.1.4...v2.4.0-rc.3

Release v2.5.0-alpha.1

## What's Changed
* feat: align configmap-reload image tag with other containers by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/64

* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.0 by @jimmidyson in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/71
* feat: add an audit dashboard to grafana-logging by @asekretenko in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/72
* chore: Bump logging-operator to 3.15.0 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/76
* chore: Update Charts of KPS to 18.1.1 & Grafana to 6.16.14 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/70
* chore: update docker image tag for dex by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/74
* feat: Provide release target by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/77
* fix: updating docs link to kubecost by @msdolbey in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/81
* Add NFS Server Provisioner service by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/78
* chore: Use workspaceNamespace instead of traefikNamespace by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/80
* chore: Add kubecost 0.20.2 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/84
* chore: update docker image tag for dex-k8s-auth by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/85
* fix: Restore all pod labels to metrics emitted by kube-state-metrics by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/83
* fix: Deploy fluent-bit for pod logs to control plane by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/86
* feat: add knative serving as kommander application by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/89
* bug: move Knative to "general" category by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/90
* fix: Upgrade Grafana to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/92
* fix: change `cert-manager` group from foundation to security by @mstruebing in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/94
* fix: Bump project-grafana-logging/kubecost graf img to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/98
* Update default values for KNative by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/99
* fix: Remove kube-prometheus-stack dep from knative by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/103
* Add metadata for knative and correct dependency information by @timcharper in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/107
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.1 by @d2iq-dispatch in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/91
* fix: Remove newlines in knative icon by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/109
* Fix misplaced `dependsOn` property for KNative by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/112
* feat: add kaptain by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/106
* chore: bump velero for K8s 1.22 by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/111
* fix: set sha to empty to ensure airgapped works by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/114
* feat: add chartmuseum app by @vespian in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/119
* feat: Add kaptain helm repository by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/120
* fix: Remove trailing whitespace (#117) by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/118
* chore: bump dex for k8s 1.22 by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/116
* fix: Add chartmuseum metadata by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/125
* feat: Update to kubetunnel 0.0.10 (compatible with kubernetes 1.22) by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/124
* feat: disable user registration in Gitea by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/123

release.body:
Release v2.4.0-rc.4

## What's Changed
* feat: align configmap-reload image tag with other containers by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/64
* feat: use TFA 3.0.3 by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/65
* chore: Add mergebot config by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/67
* chore: bump metallb app by @vespian in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/66
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.0 by @jimmidyson in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/71
* feat: add an audit dashboard to grafana-logging by @asekretenko in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/72
* chore: Bump logging-operator to 3.15.0 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/76
* chore: Update Charts of KPS to 18.1.1 & Grafana to 6.16.14 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/70
* chore: update docker image tag for dex by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/74
* feat: Provide release target by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/77
* fix: updating docs link to kubecost by @msdolbey in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/81
* Add NFS Server Provisioner service by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/78
* chore: Use workspaceNamespace instead of traefikNamespace by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/80
* chore: Add kubecost 0.20.2 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/84
* chore: update docker image tag for dex-k8s-auth by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/85
* fix: Restore all pod labels to metrics emitted by kube-state-metrics by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/83
* fix: Deploy fluent-bit for pod logs to control plane by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/86
* feat: add knative serving as kommander application by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/89
* bug: move Knative to "general" category by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/90
* fix: Upgrade Grafana to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/92
* fix: change `cert-manager` group from foundation to security by @mstruebing in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/94
* fix: Bump project-grafana-logging/kubecost graf img to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/98
* Update default values for KNative by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/99
* fix: Remove kube-prometheus-stack dep from knative by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/103
* Add metadata for knative and correct dependency information by @timcharper in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/107
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.1 by @d2iq-dispatch in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/91
* fix: Remove newlines in knative icon by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/109
* Fix misplaced `dependsOn` property for KNative by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/112
* feat: add kaptain by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/106
* chore: bump velero for K8s 1.22 by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/111
* fix: set sha to empty to ensure airgapped works by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/114
* feat: add chartmuseum app by @vespian in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/119
* feat: Add kaptain helm repository by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/120
* fix: Remove trailing whitespace (#117) by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/118
* chore: bump dex for k8s 1.22 by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/116
* fix: Add chartmuseum metadata by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/125
* feat: Update to kubetunnel 0.0.10 (compatible with kubernetes 1.22) by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/124
* feat: disable user registration in Gitea by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/123
* feat: add pre-commit and mergebot configuration  by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/127
* feat: add dummy helm releases by @vespian in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/126
* feat: Upgrade logging-operator and fluent-bit by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/122
* fix: Bump velero to 3.1.5 (CVE) by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/134
* chore: bump kommander and kommander-application to 0.2.0 by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/132

release.body:
Release v2.5.0-alpha.1

## What's Changed
* feat: align configmap-reload image tag with other containers by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/64

* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.0 by @jimmidyson in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/71
* feat: add an audit dashboard to grafana-logging by @asekretenko in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/72
* chore: Bump logging-operator to 3.15.0 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/76
* chore: Update Charts of KPS to 18.1.1 & Grafana to 6.16.14 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/70
* chore: update docker image tag for dex by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/74
* feat: Provide release target by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/77
* fix: updating docs link to kubecost by @msdolbey in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/81
* Add NFS Server Provisioner service by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/78
* chore: Use workspaceNamespace instead of traefikNamespace by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/80
* chore: Add kubecost 0.20.2 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/84
* chore: update docker image tag for dex-k8s-auth by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/85
* fix: Restore all pod labels to metrics emitted by kube-state-metrics by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/83
* fix: Deploy fluent-bit for pod logs to control plane by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/86
* feat: add knative serving as kommander application by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/89
* bug: move Knative to "general" category by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/90
* fix: Upgrade Grafana to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/92
* fix: change `cert-manager` group from foundation to security by @mstruebing in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/94
* fix: Bump project-grafana-logging/kubecost graf img to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/98
* Update default values for KNative by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/99
* fix: Remove kube-prometheus-stack dep from knative by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/103
* Add metadata for knative and correct dependency information by @timcharper in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/107
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.1 by @d2iq-dispatch in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/91

Release v2.4.0

## What's Changed
* feat: align configmap-reload image tag with other containers by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/64

* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.0 by @jimmidyson in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/71
* feat: add an audit dashboard to grafana-logging by @asekretenko in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/72
* chore: Bump logging-operator to 3.15.0 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/76
* chore: Update Charts of KPS to 18.1.1 & Grafana to 6.16.14 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/70
* chore: update docker image tag for dex by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/74
* feat: Provide release target by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/77
* fix: updating docs link to kubecost by @msdolbey in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/81
* Add NFS Server Provisioner service by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/78
* chore: Use workspaceNamespace instead of traefikNamespace by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/80
* chore: Add kubecost 0.20.2 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/84
* chore: update docker image tag for dex-k8s-auth by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/85
* fix: Restore all pod labels to metrics emitted by kube-state-metrics by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/83
* fix: Deploy fluent-bit for pod logs to control plane by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/86
* feat: add knative serving as kommander application by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/89
* bug: move Knative to "general" category by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/90
* fix: Upgrade Grafana to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/92
* fix: change `cert-manager` group from foundation to security by @mstruebing in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/94
* fix: Bump project-grafana-logging/kubecost graf img to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/98
* Update default values for KNative by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/99
* fix: Remove kube-prometheus-stack dep from knative by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/103
* Add metadata for knative and correct dependency information by @timcharper in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/107
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.1 by @d2iq-dispatch in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/91
* fix: Remove newlines in knative icon by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/109
* Fix misplaced `dependsOn` property for KNative by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/112
* feat: add kaptain by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/106
* chore: bump velero for K8s 1.22 by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/111
* fix: set sha to empty to ensure airgapped works by @takirala in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/114
* feat: add chartmuseum app by @vespian in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/119
* feat: Add kaptain helm repository by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/120

release.name: v2.4.0-rc.4
release.body:
Release v2.4.0-rc.4

## What's Changed
* feat: align configmap-reload image tag with other containers by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/64
* feat: use TFA 3.0.3 by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/65
* chore: Add mergebot config by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/67
* chore: bump metallb app by @vespian in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/66
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.0 by @jimmidyson in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/71
* feat: add an audit dashboard to grafana-logging by @asekretenko in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/72
* chore: Bump logging-operator to 3.15.0 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/76
* chore: Update Charts of KPS to 18.1.1 & Grafana to 6.16.14 by @rishabh96b in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/70
* chore: update docker image tag for dex by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/74
* feat: Provide release target by @mikolajb in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/77
* fix: updating docs link to kubecost by @msdolbey in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/81
* Add NFS Server Provisioner service by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/78
* chore: Use workspaceNamespace instead of traefikNamespace by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/80
* chore: Add kubecost 0.20.2 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/84
* chore: update docker image tag for dex-k8s-auth by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/85
* fix: Restore all pod labels to metrics emitted by kube-state-metrics by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/83
* fix: Deploy fluent-bit for pod logs to control plane by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/86
* feat: add knative serving as kommander application by @farhan5900 in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/89
* bug: move Knative to "general" category by @makkes in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/90
* fix: Upgrade Grafana to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @branden in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/92
* fix: change `cert-manager` group from foundation to security by @mstruebing in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/94
* fix: Bump project-grafana-logging/kubecost graf img to pull in a fix for CVE-2021-43798 by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/98
* Update default values for KNative by @alembiewski in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/99
* fix: Remove kube-prometheus-stack dep from knative by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/103
* Add metadata for knative and correct dependency information by @timcharper in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/107
* feat: Upgrade flux to 0.24.1 by @d2iq-dispatch in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/91
* fix: Remove newlines in knative icon by @gracedo in https://github.com/mesosphere/kommander-applications/pull/109
